name: Super Capybros. 4 Advance
description:
Simple Arcade game made for #365indiesjam2017 theme: "Death is useful".

Kill everything that moves and help the Capybara Brothers get out of this nightmare.

Controls: All Characters

WASD: Move Aim: Mouse Mouse Left: Shoot Mouse Right: Special

Mage

Mouse Left: Fireball Hold/Release Mouse Left: Charge Shield/Release Shield Mouse Right w/ Shield: Drop Shield

Bomber

Mouse Left: Shoot bombs Mouse Right: Explode Bombs

Archer

Hold/Release Mouse Left: Shoot arrows

Team

Game by:  kyuu
Music by: WayRise
SFX by: MatsuneHikku

Jam link: http://jams.gamejolt.io/365indiesjam2017/
